title: Jim Belushi's Mission From God; GrowGeneration Partnership
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: "You should never feel bad about feeling good." Jim Belushi, actor and founder of Belushi Farms, sums up his feelings about cannabis. He joins Jeremy Corrao, Vice President of Commercial Operations at GrowGeneration to discuss their recent partnership, plans for greenhouses and how to get yields up. Advocating for change, home grow market and GRWG's plans for growth. Getting the band back together at MJ Unpacked! Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
